description.S1: You found the needed keycard and opened up a route out of the lab for Cassandra.
description.S2: Unlock her door and inform her of her available escape routes.

blurb.B1: Talk to her after opening the door and Lie (30), Intimidate (51) or Persuade (21) to get her to give you the research (2000xp).
blurb.B2: Tell her you didn't save her for free and obtain 1200 Bit Cartridge.
blurb.B3: You can Persuade or Intimidate (both 31) to get her to give you a further 625 Bit Cartridge.

description.S1: You got Anton's diet toothpaste research data.
description.S2: Head to Roseway and speak with him.

blurb.B1: If you return to Anton Crane after resolving the lab peacefully,
blurb.B2: he and Porter will be arguing about it.
blurb.B3: You can give him the research data for massive Auntie Cleo Reputation Up, 3755 Bit Cartridge, 23000xp and Researcher's Scrubs.
blurb.B4: He will further reward you with Auntie Cleo reputation if you didn't kill the Raptidons.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Please tell me you've cleared a way out of here.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've got the key, I'm going to let you out.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've unlocked your cell and dealt with the guards. You'll have to fend for yourself against the rapts.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: So you have! I am much obliged.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: And now, if you do not mind, I have had quite enough of this wretched place.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm going to need you to turn over that research.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I didn't save your life for free.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh really? And why, pray tell, would I do a thing like that?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The situation's liable to turn ugly if you don't.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Because you don't want a price on your head.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: How should I know? Because you want to do the right thing?

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Don't give me that look. You have made your point clear enough.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Here, take the damned research. Tell Crane I hope he chokes on it.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Your point is well taken. I would rather not spend the rest of my days looking over my shoulder for the shadow of my headhunter.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Do I? No, I do not think I do. This research was hard-won, and I plan on enjoying every bit I make off its sale.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: I am not ungrateful for your help. You saved my life. I believe I owe you a drink or two.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Attack> I never should have helped you. I'm taking that research.

dialog.speaker: CassandraOMalley (Female)
dialog.utterance: Good. I never trust a freelancer who works for free.
